items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Comfortable, Just A Tad Baggy
items.body: This is a really nice looking sweater. It is made of acrylic material, but has a softer finish than most acrylics, hence it feels and wears more like cotton, but without the shrinkage. The listing says that this is intended as an "oversize" sweater, and that is accurate. In particular, it tends to be large around the waist, while the shoulders are sized more conventionally. It is moderately warm without feeling heavy or bulky. I like that it is machine washable, but wish that it could be placed in the dryer without damage. It comes in a vacuum-sealed package, so it may need to be washed before it can be worn. The price is about what you would expect for a sweater of this quality. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight, warm and not bulky
items.body: This is a beautiful sweater! I ordered the purple color. The sweater is not bulky for being a cable knit, it lays nice and flat against your body, the material is soft and flexible, not see-thru, zero odor and arrived in a see-thru plastic bag inside a box. I have long arms and the sleeves are a perfect length. This sweater will look great with jeans, dress pants and even leggings, it's very versatile! Read more
items.author: Babs

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent! The
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This is definitely not as itchy as other affordable sweaters I've tried. It definitely arrives with all already fuzzy look which makes me guess it may be prone to pilling and not last long. But I love it. I went for a size M over my usual XS/S to get an oversized fit and I like how it turned out. I wish the cable knit pattern covered the whole thing, like the back. It'd look more upscale Read more
items.author: Victoria

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality knit, soft and warm
items.body: This is a very good quality knit sweater, with tightly woven cable detailing. This is higher quality than you would expect for the price. It is made to be oversized - and it truly is. The size small description indicates a 44” bust - so it fits very generously. It is a boxy cut, and the ribbed knit at the bottom does little to reduce the boxy shape. The sleeves are also a little fatter and longer than I like, so I rolled them to form a cuff. The description says cropped styling, but it really is not. Simply just an inch or two shorter than I would expect from a normal sweater. It is a good length to wear with jeans or leggings. So bottom line - in all the pictures in the Amazon listing, the model has the sweater tucked in some fashion for a photo shoot. But if actually wearing the sweater, it will be bulkier than those photos show. And in the end, I will wear this and be happy with the purchase. Read more
items.author: Tennessee Vol

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: Beautiful heavy knit sweater. I love the oversized fit. The knit it thick, very soft and warm. The color and fit are true ro image. I usually wear a medium and the medium fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: LeighAnn Morris

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Super cute fits large like it’s supposed to and is really soft! Love it for winter Read more
items.author: Summermz81

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Sage Blue, Dusty Lavender, White, Cream White, Burgundy, Black, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
